api_list.name: imagefile
api_list.description: Send an imagefile directly and get the coordinates of the face boudary boxes as a result

api_list.name: imageurl
api_list.description: Send the url of an image and receive the boundry box coordinates of the detected faces as a result

api_list.name: imageurl as json
api_list.description: Send the url of an image and receive the boundry box coordinates of the detected faces as a result
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facedetection9.p.rapidapi.com/faces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facedetection9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facedetection9.p.rapidapi.com/faces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facedetection9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
